summary: Frontend-only testing completed for 6 bug fixes. All bug fixes verified working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: NotificationsClient.tsx: Well-structured with proper data-testid attributes, time formatting, and notification type icons
GiftCoins.tsx: Modal uses 'fixed inset-0 flex items-center justify-center' for proper vertical centering
GiftCoins.tsx: effectiveAmount correctly calculates from customAmount when set, otherwise uses preset amount
GiftCoins.tsx: Button text dynamically shows 'Send {effectiveAmount} Coins'
TalentProfileClient.tsx: GallerySection component correctly implements Free/Premium tabs with data-testid attributes
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 6 bug fixes verified working. Notifications page loads correctly. GiftCoins modal is vertically centered and button amount updates dynamically for both preset and custom amounts. Gallery section on talent profile has Free/Premium tabs with proper data-testid attributes.

bug_1_notifications_page.evidence: Page loads with 'Notifications' header and 'No Notifications' empty state

bug_2_gift_modal_centering.description: GiftCoins modal is vertically centered on the page
bug_2_gift_modal_centering.evidence: Modal container uses 'fixed inset-0 flex items-center justify-center' classes

bug_3_gift_preset_amount.description: GiftCoins submit button amount updates when preset selection changes
bug_3_gift_preset_amount.evidence: Button text changes from 'Send 100 Coins' to 'Send 500 Coins' to 'Send 1000 Coins' when presets clicked

bug_4_gift_custom_amount.description: GiftCoins submit button amount updates when custom amount is entered
bug_4_gift_custom_amount.evidence: Button text shows 'Send 6000 Coins' after entering 6000 in custom input

bug_5_gallery_tabs_exist.description: Talent profile page shows Gallery with Free/Premium tabs

bug_6_gallery_tabs_switch.description: Gallery tabs switch between Free and Premium content on talent profile
bug_6_gallery_tabs_switch.evidence: Clicking Premium tab shows 'No premium content available', clicking Free tab shows gallery images
